participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and energetic, Emily enjoys spending time with friends and trying new recipes.
participant_1.background: I had a small party with my friends. I love to go horseback riding. I work for a beer distributor. I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise. I like to make bagels.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and sociable, Michael finds joy in cooking and spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I enjoy the sense of accomplishment and joy that comes from cooking a delicious meal for my family and friends. I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active. I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together. I am an omnivore. I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.

content.text: What is your favorite type of pizza?
I love all kinds of pizza! But my favorite is pepperoni with extra cheese and olives. What is your favorite kind?
I love a good veggie pizza! I love to load it up with spinach, mushrooms, and tomatoes.
That sounds delicious! I bet it's really healthy too.
It is! But it's still so good. I love to make my own bagels too.
Really? That's awesome! I've never tried to make my own bagels.
It's not too hard. You just need some yeast, flour, water, and salt.
That sounds easy enough. I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's really fun and they taste so much better than store-bought bagels.
Thanks for the tip! I'll definitely have to try it.
You're welcome! I hope you like them.
